name: Targ: The Game
overview: Targ is a shoot 'em up in a maze in which you play a vehicle similar to a race car. The goal is to kill all the bad guys (represented by arrows) on the screen in order to advance to the next level. The baddies become more aggressive as the levels progress. You also get an extra 100 points every time you complete a level. . It is a graphically simple as it's coded entirely in BASIC, however do not let that fool you, as it's an addictive clone of the Exidy arcade game of the same name. It was developed by Bill Lucier, however the year of release is not known.
